languages.text: {n}Серебряные искры вспыхивают в волосах Говорящего-с-Богами, отвлекая Винтерскейла от разговора. Жрец ежится, словно от холода, стонет, рвет лицо ногтями... И запрокидывает голову к небу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Серебряные искры вспыхивают в волосах Говорящего-с-Богами, отвлекая Винтерскейла от разговора. Жрец ежится, словно от холода, стонет, рвет лицо ногтями... И запрокидывает голову к небу.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Silver sparks flash at the ends of Speaks-With-Gods's hair, distracting Calligos from the conversation. The priest shudders as if from cold, moans, claws at his face with his nails... and throws his head back to face the sky.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Серебряные искры вспыхивают в волосах Говорящего-с-Богами, отвлекая Винтерскейла от разговора. Жрец ежится, словно от холода, стонет, рвет лицо ногтями... И запрокидывает голову к небу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The silver sparks gleam at the ends of Speaks-With-Gods hair, distracting Winterscale from the conversation. The priest shudders, as if cold, moans, claws at his face with his nails... And throws his head up to face the sky.{/n}

{n}The silver sparks gleam at the ends of Speaks-With-Gods hair, distracting Winterscale from the conversation. The priest shudders, as if cold, moans, claws at his face with his nails... And throws his head up to face the sky.{/n}

{n}The silver sparks gleam at the ends of Speaks-With-Gods hair, distracting Winterscale from the conversation. The priest shudders, as if cold, moans, claws at his face with his nails... And throws his head up to face the sky.{/n}

{n}The silver sparks gleam at the ends of Speaks-With-Gods hair, distracting Winterscale from the conversation. The priest shudders, as if cold, moans, claws at his face with his nails... And throws his head up to face the sky.{/n}

{n}Silver sparks flash at the ends of Speaks-With-Gods's hair, distracting Calligos from the conversation. The priest shudders as if from cold, moans, claws at his face with his nails... and throws his head back to face the sky.{/n}

{n}Silver sparks flash at the ends of Speaks-With-Gods's hair, distracting Calligos from the conversation. The priest shudders as if from cold, moans, claws at his face with his nails... and throws his head back to face the sky.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Unos chispazos plateados saltan de las puntas de los cabellos de Habla-con-Dioses, distrayendo a Calligos de la conversación. El sacerdote se estremece como si estuviese aterido, gime y se araña la cara... y levanta la cabeza para mirar al cielo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Silver sparks flash at the ends of Speaks-With-Gods's hair, distracting Calligos from the conversation. The priest shudders as if from cold, moans, claws at his face with his nails... and throws his head back to face the sky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los chispazos plateados que saltan de las puntas de los cabellos de Habla-con-Dioses distraen a Winterscale de la conversación. El sacerdote se estremece como si estuviese aterido, gime y se araña la cara... y levanta la cabeza para mirar al cielo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}“神谕”的头发末端闪烁着银光，引起了卡里戈斯的注意。祭司颤抖起来，像是打着冷颤。他呻吟着，用指甲抓着自己的脸……随后仰头望向天空。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Silver sparks flash at the ends of Speaks-With-Gods's hair, distracting Calligos from the conversation. The priest shudders as if from cold, moans, claws at his face with his nails... and throws his head back to face the sky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}“神谕”的头发末端闪烁着银光，引起了温特斯凯尔的注意。祭司颤抖起来，像是打着冷颤。他呻吟着，用指甲抓着自己的脸……随后仰头望向天空。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des étincelles argentées scintillent à l'extrémité des cheveux de Parle-aux-Dieux et détournent l'attention de Winterscale. Le prêtre est frissonne comme s'il avait froid, gémit, se griffe le visage... et lève brusquement la tête vers le ciel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Silver sparks flash at the ends of Speaks-With-Gods's hair, distracting Calligos from the conversation. The priest shudders as if from cold, moans, claws at his face with his nails... and throws his head back to face the sky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les étincelles argentées qui scintillent à l'extrémité des cheveux de Parle-aux-Dieux détournent l'attention de Winterscale. Le prêtre est frissonne comme s'il avait froid, gémit, se griffe le visage... et lève brusquement la tête vers le ciel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}銀の火花が神々との語り部の髪先で散り、カリゴス注意を会話から逸らす。司祭は寒そうに身震いし、うめき声を上げ、爪で顔を引っ掻く…そして頭を後ろに倒し、空に向ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Silver sparks flash at the ends of Speaks-With-Gods's hair, distracting Calligos from the conversation. The priest shudders as if from cold, moans, claws at his face with his nails... and throws his head back to face the sky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}銀の火花が神々との語り部の髪先で散り、カリゴス注意を会話から逸らす。司祭は寒そうに身震いし、うめき声を上げ、爪で顔を引っ掻く…そして頭を後ろに倒し、空に向ける。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die silbernen Funken blitzen an Spricht-mit-den-Götterns Haarspitzen auf, was Calligos von dem Gespräch ablenkt. Der Priest schaudert, als sei ihm kalt, stöhnt, kratzt sich mit den Fingernägeln über das Gesicht ... und wirft den Kopf in den Nacken, um in den Himmel zu blicken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Silver sparks flash at the ends of Speaks-With-Gods's hair, distracting Calligos from the conversation. The priest shudders as if from cold, moans, claws at his face with his nails... and throws his head back to face the sky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die silbernen Funken blitzen an Spricht-mit-den-Götterns Haarspitzen auf, was Winterzunder von dem Gespräch ablenkt. Der Priest schaudert, als sei ihm kalt, stöhnt, kratzt sich mit den Fingernägeln über das Gesicht ... Und wirft seinen Kopf in den Nacken, um in den Himmel zu blicken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tanrıların Dili'nin saç tellerinin ucunda parıldayan gümüş kıvılcımlar, Calligos'un dikkatini dağıtarak konuşmasına engel oluyor. Rahip, âdeta soğuktan ürperircesine titriyor, inliyor, tırnaklarıyla yüzünü tırmalıyor ve... Başını geriye atıp gökle yüzleşiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Silver sparks flash at the ends of Speaks-With-Gods's hair, distracting Calligos from the conversation. The priest shudders as if from cold, moans, claws at his face with his nails... and throws his head back to face the sky.{/n}
